metadata.title: CVE-2021-47006 linux
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:  ARM: 9064/1: hw_breakpoint: Do not directly check the event's overflow_handler hook  The commit 1879445dfa7b ("perf/core: Set event's default ::overflow_handler()") set a default event->overflow_handler in perf_event_alloc(), and replace the check event->overflow_handler with is_default_overflow_handler(), but one is missing.  Currently, the bp->overflow_handler can not be NULL. As a result, enable_single_step() is always not invoked.  Comments from Zhen Lei:   https://patchwork.kernel.org/project/linux-arm-kernel/patch/20210207105934.2001-1-thunder.leizhen@huawei.com/
